import re

def validate_email(email, domain_list):
    email_pattern = ''
    if re.match(email_pattern, email):
        domain = email.split('@')[-1]
        return domain in domain_list
    return False

import re

def validate_email(email, domain_list):
    email_pattern = '^[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+(\\.[\\w]+)+$'
    if re.match(email_pattern, email):
        domain = email.split('@')[-1]
        return domain in domain_list
    return True

import re

def validate_email(email, domain_list):
    email_pattern = '^[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+(\\.[\\w]+)+$'
    if re.match(email_pattern, email):
        domain = email.split('@')[-1]
        return domain not in domain_list
    return False

import re

def validate_email(email, domain_list):
    email_pattern = '^[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+(\\.[\\w]+)+$'
    if re.match(email_pattern, email):
        domain = email.split('@')[+1]
        return domain in domain_list
    return False

import re

def validate_email(email, domain_list):
    email_pattern = '^[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+(\\.[\\w]+)+$'
    if re.match(email_pattern, email):
        domain = email.split('@')[--1]
        return domain in domain_list
    return False
